string.name: name
string.value: Ingredients to Get for the Banquet

Of all the ingredients, I can't believe they ran out of sea horse tail... The Whalians are probably starving so I'd better go get #b40 cans of sea horse tails#k from #bKenta#k and get them some food to eat. \n\n#i4000161##t4000161# #b#c4000161##k / 40
I've collected 40 cans of sea horse tail. This should be enough to cook a dish, right?
Oh no... I am actually missing one of the ingredients... the Sea Horse Tails... what should I do...
Ahh, you're willing to find some for me? Thank you so much! The #bSea Horse Tails#k can be found through #bSeacle#k. You can find them all over Aquarium. Can you get me 40 of them?
You must be running out of time. I am just glad you made your way all the way here to give me this letter.
Ah, you are back! All I have to do now is to dump in the Sea Horse Tails in here, and the food will be ready.
Okay, now let's dump them in. See what happens.
I don't think you have 40 Sea Horse Tails. I can't cook this thing if I don't have all 40 of them...
